website_summaries.verdict: Made from food-grade plastic, this cookie press is generously sized to maximize your time. Don't start with dough that's too firm, though.
pros: Generous size means you won't have to refill often
Comes with 16 plastic design discs and six decorator tips
cons: Does not work well with firm dough

customer_reviews.title: RE: Easy and Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookie press. I was easily able to make spritz cookies and also had fun decorating my cut out cookies. It is easy to switch out the discs for different shapes and also has a nice assortment of icing tips. I have purchased different cookie presses before but this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Is Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: This cookies press is easy to use. I was a little disappointed because I bought to make Christmas cookies. Sadly there weren't any Christmas Discs. It also comes shipped in a very basic box. The directions were barely there, good thing it is easy to figure out, and the one recipe that was on the paper was incomplete so it couldn't be used.
customer_reviews.author: ylisa7

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, this cookie press was one use only and in the trash it goes...Extremely hard to use (made butter cookies for Christmas). So hard on the hands and wrists. Broke on the first use. And my husband has been using cookie presses for years (bought this one to replace the old one that finally broke after years of making perfect cookies). Don't bother...keep looking for a better one!
customer_reviews.author: Loveagoodbook

customer_reviews.title: I make.Christmas cookies with this product every year!
customer_reviews.text: This product as purchased to replace the one that was.lost when we moved. I on of these for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer's B. Montella

customer_reviews.title: Good for begining spritz cookies?
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but it is harder than my mom's to get the cookies to stick to the pan and the trigger sometimes sticks. Easy to clean though, and great selection of cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of different types of cookie shapes
customer_reviews.text: I like my cookie presser it's just a little hard to use maybe I just need to learn to use it
customer_reviews.author: Nolberta Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookie Press (if you don’t use really stiff dough)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my daughter. She says it works great as long as your dough is not too thick. She bought a roll of cookie dough (after her arms ached from trying to push through the dough she made) and the consistency of it was exactly what she needed and pressed through easily. She made a batch of cookies and they were perfect! Only used two times so I will update if her opinion changes.
customer_reviews.author: Cinder

customer_reviews.title: Product incompatible for my use.
customer_reviews.text: The finish on the Plastic barrel distorted in appearance with molding also compromised. Not suitable for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Best baking tool other than your mixer
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of a art to load it, but once mastered, the consistently sized deposits piped into baking molds or "piped" onto a cake as decoration via the piping nozzles supplied. I purchased this primarily to load mini cupcake pans that hold 24 mini's apiece I was not disappointed I will tell my baking friends to purchase this "pink kitchen caulk gun"
customer_reviews.author: Robin P

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get this thing to work takes more time than rolling out the dough and using a cookie cutter. Ended up just making plain old rolled cookies because I couldn’t be bothered.
customer_reviews.author: Steffi

customer_reviews.title: Made it easy!
customer_reviews.text: I used this cookie press for the first time this past Christmas. I used a package of sugar cookie mix and made the cutest variety of cookies. Everybody loved them & was surprised that I actually made them myself. I suggest not to grease your pan or use parchment paper so the cookies can cling directly to the pan. It was so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy H

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy -  This cookie press did not work well at all
customer_reviews.text: Tried making cookies for Christmas. This cookie press did not work. The cookies did not form well and did not separate from the press onto the sheet. Gave up and bought a Wilton. This product is cheaply made, all light plastic, from China. Wilton cookie press is made much better.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ruddock

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: Makes very cute cookies and it's really fun to use once you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: It work very well for me.
customer_reviews.text: I like your product, not used for cookies. I use it to stuff peppers with cream cheese and sausages ground up. I didn't use any of the disk just mix cheese and sausage . Place mixture in tune pipe the peppers and wrap with bacon . I have trouble placing mixture in tube with spatula, one at a time. But it still make 20 to 60 peppers at a time. I would buy the product against a time saver.
customer_reviews.author: nathan perryman

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is that the packaging or the press did not indicate if it was dishwasher safe. I looked back to the Amazon listing and it said to wash with a little detergent and warm water. So I will not put it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: Hate it !!
customer_reviews.text: Very small cookies. Not happy with this choice at all.
customer_reviews.author: sandy rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but it could be better. I would recommend it for its price. Many shapes are included. Makes making cookies fan with the kids
customer_reviews.author: M07ssine

customer_reviews.title: More cookies & less time
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes this machine .it save her time and she can do much more cookies in less time
customer_reviews.author: nehal mohamed /mohamed ak

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Just used this and LOVE IT! So easy to use and clean my 4 yr old could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift and easy to clean and a whole lot easier to use with less cookie making mess
customer_reviews.author: Shone Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the 1st 2 times but nit at all the 3rd. Not sure if the same recipe I used before was different consistency or press broke. Afraid to try it again
customer_reviews.author: nancy allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice cookie gun set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an old cookie gun. Looking forward to using it for deviled eggs at Easter.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaMaria Bjorkquist

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Junk junk junk. Do not buy!! Doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Higly recommended for cookies
customer_reviews.text: I used it to do amonia cookies and petit four and it worked pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Aya Galal

customer_reviews.title: Cookie press a holiday success
customer_reviews.text: I used the cookie press for the first time today to make Christmas cookies. I filled the cylinder with cookie dough and began pressing out cookies. I had to redo 3-4 cookies as I pressed too hard and ended up with a blob instead of a wreath or snowflake. I couldn't find any cookie presses in any of our local department stores. I like the price and convenience that Amazon offered.
customer_reviews.author: susiecue

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your mone
customer_reviews.text: It's more a toy than a cookie press would probably work well with easy Bake Oven recipes. It barely fit my hand and the trigger kept slipping. Very cheaply made. I suppose I should have expected it for the price. About the only thing this is good for may be for piping icing. It sure doesn't work very well with cookie dough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to be used during the holidays
customer_reviews.author: N. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product-lasts a long time, too
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these before. And it lasted 15 years. And I use it a lot to decorate deviled eggs and decorate cupcakes and make cookies. Very easy to clean and disassemble and doesn’t break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I purchased it primarily to use for filling eclairs, but also tried it out as a cookie press for a very soft dough. It worked quite well. My 4 year old son liked using it as well, very kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Esfahanian

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: Getting used to making spritz cookies. I wish it would have come with pictures to let you know what the cookies look like with each disc, better directions would help.
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: Nice made, sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This came after Christmas so was not able to give as a gift but still used and cookies came out well
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Usability
customer_reviews.text: Finally used this product since purchased and it worked well, I truly like it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mingo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good upgrade from the one my mother used. It is much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: William Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: The price and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: My old cookie press died during the holidays. I was worried that the new one wouldn't come in time. It came right away. Saved me!
customer_reviews.author: Lind Lindstrand

customer_reviews.title: The quality was the as expected
customer_reviews.text: It was cheaply made and the cookie dough stuck to it as I pressed on the cookie sheet. It was hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cambom Clear Cookie Press Gun Kit with 16 Discs and 6 Icing Tips for DIY Biscuit Maker and Decoration Red
product_meta.description:
Color:Red

Color:Red

A classic cookie press set will make the baking amazing.

Features:

1, Clear big tube :lets you know how much dough you have and no need to add the dough frequently.

2, 16 interchangeable disks include christmas tree, flowers, butterfly, wreath, snowflakes and so on. 6 decoration tips will take more fun for you baking.

3, stainless steel cylinder rod and wrench make the cookie press set more durable.

4,easy operate, even children can operate it.

5, Easy to clean: you can clean it with warm, soapy water, hand wash recommended.

Usage Tips:

1, Filled with room-temperature dough that is neither too soft nor too hard.

2.Cookie dough will dry quickly under cold weather; Too glutinous or too hard dough will not suitable for cookie gun.

3.If cannot press or difficult to demould, you can warm the dough by heat water through thermal insulation.

Package include:

1*cookie press gun

16*cookie cutter discs

6* lcing tips.

Our Guarantee:

Always feel free to contact with us by email when you have any questions and concerns.

√ Friendly Customer Service Always here to help, feel free to email or call with any questions or concerns.

√ 100% Money Back BUY with Full confidence & "Peace Of Mind", if you're not 100% satisfied send it back for a Refund within 90 Days of purchase.
feature_bullets: PERFECT DESIGN: the size of the clear tube is 2.24 inches diameter and 8.66 inches in height, not need to add the dough frequently, it lets you know how much dough you have to go. 16 sturdy plastic discs are perfect for creating batches of fun, 6 decorating tips meet your different needs.

EASY TO USE : Fill the dough into the cookie press gun, cover the discs and screw the nut, force the air out, then you can press your cookies. All the parts of the cookie press set are detachable, and the biscuit maker is very easy to clean.
FOOD GRADE MATERIAL: the cookie press machine made of high quality food-grade ABS, AS and PP (BPA-free). Tasteless, non-toxic and durable.
EASY CLEAN: every parts of the cookie press kit is detachable, you can clean it with a little detergent and warm water, but don’t boiled.
GOOD GIFTS: Closely and firmly packaging of the plastic cookie press, perfect for being a gift of Christmas or other holiday and occasion.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars136 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
